pages.text: You will want to avail yourself of the nearest cluster of tall grass. By breaking it you may discover $(l:herbs/wildroot)wildroot$()  -- which was used to craft this tome, along with terra spores and aubergine seeds.

pages.name: Wildroot
pages.text: Break tall grass with your hand or another implement to potentially find $(1:herbs/wildroot)wildroot$().

pages.name: Aubergine Seeds
pages.text: Break tall grass with your hand or another implement to potentially find $(1:resources/aubergine)aubergine seeds$().

pages.name: Terra Spores
pages.text: Break tall grass with your hand or another implement to potentially find $(1:herbs/terra_moss)terra spores$().
